players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob was killed, any suspects? I'm a villager and so is Diana."
You: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia. Be cautious, Bob."
Diana: "I'm the mafioso. Look out, Alice."
Charlie: "Alice, consider re-investigating Diana. Charlie and I are villagers."
Diana: "Will keep an eye on Alice. Charlie and I will work together."
You: "Will watch Diana closely. Charlie and I will cooperate."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
